488990.name: ePic Character Generator - Season #2: Female Elf
488990.description:
This Fantasy themed package can be used to create various Female Elf characters with pointy ears of noble or hunter ranks alike.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 15 skins
- 6 colourable hairs
- 6 hair presets
- 5 hats
- 4 hats with hair
- 2 full set of clothes
- 22 boots
- 13 pants
- 30 tops
- 2 top armors
- 6 under armors
- 2 back items
- 13 bracelets
- 3 chest items
- 2 coats
- 4 cloaks
- 6 necklaces
- 4 loin clothes
- 1 thigh item
- 3 tights
- 10 waist items
- 21 weapons

Additional content available to all Season #2 Fantasy themed packs in the General category:
- 1 aura
- 5 backgrounds
- 7 companions
- 5 items
- 2 card templates
